Room.Name: Storage Closet
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Arioch & Arcana's storage closet.
Room.LongDescription: A room sized walk-in closet, holding the both Arioch's & Arcana's posessions lies before you. To the left, Arioch's designer suits hang neatly next to his shinning dragon-slaying armor. To the right, Arcana's dresses, blouses, and skirts create a virtual rainbow of clothing. Strangely enough, even two treasure chests lie on the ground, holding riches beyond imagination.
